video_poker

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • video_poker.Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the deck of cards

      Constant value of Cards per suit

      Constant maximum total of cards

      The deck's card total

      The index of the card at the top of the deck

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card draw()
      Draws a single card from the deck
      Hand getHand(int size)
      Draws a hand from the deck
      void shuffle()
      Shuffles the deck randomly Implements the Fisher-Yates shuffle algorithm, which effectively creates an unbiased permutation of a finite sequence.

        Returns:
